body: Maps                  PDF Maps   Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park Map (1.82MB pdf) Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park Summit Area Map (220KB pdf) Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park Kahuku Unit (1.42MB pdf) National Parks on the Island of Hawai'i (780KB pdf)  Please note: The Kahuku Unit of Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park is only open on weekends (Saturday and Sunday) from 9:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. The gate is locked at 3:00 p.m.  Links to maps outside of this website:  National Park Service Cartographic Resources Home Page U.S. Geological Survey's Maps of Hawai'i Island
title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park: Maps
